actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the operation of certain broadcasting stations.

summary.text: Requires a radio station to have a license under the Communications Act of 1934 if it is engaged in television broadcasting (unless solely in the function of rebroadcasting the sequals of television broadcast stations), or radio broadcasting on frequencies below 1610 kilocycles with transmitting power in excess of 10 kilowatts. (Amends 47 U.S.C. 318)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the operation of certain broadcasting stations.
